column1: Jinxiang County (simplified Chinese: 金乡县; traditional Chinese: 金鄉縣; pinyin: Jīnxiāng Xiàn; lit.: 'gold hometown') is a county of southwestern Shandong province
column3: bordering Jiangsu province to the southeast. It is under the administration of Jining City.

column2: 369 in 1999.The county town of Jinxiang is known as "the world's garlic capital"
column3: producing 80% of the world's garlic exports.
